sourcesContent:
import { useContext, useState } from 'react' import { Context } from '../context' function ModalPicture() { const { modalActive, setModalActive, number, setNumber } = useContext(Context) const [one, setOneModal] = useState(true) const [two, setTwoModal] = useState(false) const [three, setThreeModal] = useState(false) const [four, setFourModal] = useState(false) const mainPhoto = { backgroundImage: `url(../images/image-product-${number}.jpg)`, } const handleOne = () => { setNumber(1) setOneModal(true) setTwoModal(false) setThreeModal(false) setFourModal(false) } const handleTwo = () => { setNumber(2) setOneModal(false) setTwoModal(true) setThreeModal(false) setFourModal(false) } const handleThree = () => { setNumber(3) setOneModal(false) setTwoModal(false) setThreeModal(true) setFourModal(false) } const handleFour = () => { setNumber(4) setOneModal(false) setTwoModal(false) setThreeModal(false) setFourModal(true) } return (
) } export { ModalPicture }
